name: vimscript coding aids
summary: some coding aids for writing vim scripts
description:
See http://github.com/MarcWeber/theonevimlib.
Start by reading core/docs/tovl.vim

There is a plugin called
plugins#filetype#vim#vl_repo#PluginVL_RepoStuff

Enjoy, join and contribute!
install_details:
I merged the completion stuff with vim-dev-plugin http://github.com/c9s/vim-dev-plugin
I may merge the fix prefix functions somewhen in the future
